description: This file is a complete HTML page that defines the user interface and client-side logic for browsing databases, tables, and data visualization in a web-based database viewer application.
external_methods: loadTables ( load tables for selected database )
loadTableData ( load data for selected table )
renderTable ( render table data in HTML )

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of available databases from the server and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list and resets current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show or hide its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads and displays the list of tables for the selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data rows for a selected table, with a limit of 50 records.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Creates HTML for the data table based on fetched data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates HTML for individual table cells, handling different data types and long content.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Toggles expanded view for cell content to show full data.
